title: Welcome to Balanzin
p:
Yust click on the game you wont to play and have fun!
Some games may work only on PC

Copyright © 2019 ® by Fritz_179
description: Play all of your favorite games, ranging from strategical gameplays to a relaxing avtivities while discovering a museum of old and new gamestyles.

cards.title: Block Racer! (WIP)
cards.p: An attemp to create a geme with levels, and a more complicated game logic!

cards.title: Terraria!
cards.p:
Terraria in js!
All_Diamond_Speedrun in 2:23 min.

Do you want to break the word record? Give it a try!

cards.p: Play Chess against another human, yourself or my artificial intelligence!
